name: GPT-UA
title: GPT-UA - free ChatGPT assistant

errors.internal: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.notEnoughDetails: Please provide more details for your request.
errors.only280CharsSupported: In this mode, keep questions under 280 characters.
errors.insecureContext: This feature is only available in a secure context (HTTPS) in some or all supported browsers.
errors.apiKey: The API '{{key}}' is not attached to any budget. Please, make sure the site URL is correct.

budget.donate: 🚨 OpenAI charges around $0.005-$0.03 per answer. The site author helps fund this, but due to the high user volume, it's often insufficient. Please consider contributing - it's automated and easy.  🙏

requestSummary: So far, you have made {{requestsNum}} request(s), costing approximately ${{costUSD}} (≈ {{costUAH}}₴).
topUpQuestion: Have you topped up the website's budget?
chipTooltip: This is the amount of money from the website's shared budget that you have spent.

mode.note_default: Chat can't browse the web or see pictures, but it's the cheapest and fastest mode for everyday tasks.
mode.note_gpt4: Chat GPT-4 understands better and is suitable for complex questions. But it is more expensive and slower.
mode.note_research: Google mode researches information online to verify your claims; it usually takes longer.
mode.note_wolfram: Science mode uses formulas, graphs, and precise data to solve your task; it usually takes more time.
mode.note_wiki: Wiki mode researches information using Wikipedia as the only source; it usually takes longer.
